text: Chagai is the largest district of Pakistan and is on the northwest corner of Balochistan, Pakistan. It forms a triangular internationalised border with Afghanistan and Iran. ==Administration== Chagai is administratively subdivided into the following tehsils: * Chagai Tehsil * Dak Tehsil * Nokundi Tehsil * Saindak Tehsil * Taftan Tehsil Category:Districts of British India
title: Chagai District
